mapper.select: SELECT CO_DIV ,BK_DAY ,BK_COS ,BK_TIME ,BK_ROUNDF ,BK_PERSON ,BK_CHARGE FROM BK_HISTORY WHERE BK_DAY = #{dateId} AND BK_YN = 'N' AND CO_DIV = '100' AND VIEW_ID = NULL OR VIEW_ID = #{id}

SELECT A.CO_DIV ,A.CL_SOLAR ,A.CL_DAYDIV ,A.CL_BUSINESS ,A.CL_BK_START ,A.CL_BK_START_TIME ,IFNULL(B.ReservationCnt, 0) as ReservationCnt ,DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d') as NOW_DAY ,DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%H%i') as NOW_TIME FROM CL_DAYINFO as A left outer join(select CO_DIV ,BK_DAY ,count(bh.BK_TIME) as ReservationCnt from bk_history bh where BK_DAY like CONCAT(#{YMId},'%') and BK_YN = 'N' group by BK_DAY) as B on A.CO_DIV = B.CO_DIV and A.CL_SOLAR = B.BK_DAY WHERE A.CO_DIV ='100' AND A.CL_SOLAR LIKE CONCAT(#{YMId},'%')
SELECT CO_DIV ,BK_RSVNO ,BK_DAY ,BK_COS ,BK_TIME ,BK_ROUNDF ,BK_PERSON ,BK_CHARGE ,DATE_FORMAT(now(), "%Y%m%d") as NOW_DAY FROM BK_HISTORY WHERE CO_DIV = '100' AND BK_MSNUM = #{MS_NUM}
mapper.update: UPDATE BK_HISTORY SET BK_NAME = NULL ,BK_MSNUM = NULL ,BK_FIRST_PHONE1 = NULL ,BK_MID_PHONE1 = NULL ,BK_LAST_PHONE1 = NULL ,BK_RSVNO = NULL ,BK_YN = 'N' ,UPDATE_DATETIME = now() ,UPDATE_IP = #{ip} WHERE CO_DIV = '100' AND BK_RSVNO = #{rNum}
UPDATE BK_HISTORY SET VIEW_ID = NULL ,LIMIT_DATE = now() WHERE CO_DIV = '100' AND VIEW_ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT CO_DIV ,BK_DAY ,BK_COS ,BK_TIME ,BK_ROUNDF ,BK_PERSON ,BK_CHARGE FROM BK_HISTORY WHERE BK_DAY = #{dateId} AND BK_YN = 'N' AND CO_DIV = '100' AND VIEW_ID = #{id} AND LIMIT_DATE > now()
